name: JazzyPay
author: JazzyPay

sections.description:
Introduction

JazzyPay for WooCommerce plugin integrates JazzyPay with your WooCommerce store and lets you accept payment through JazzyPay’s secure payment gateway.

About JazzyPay

JazzyPay empower businesses of all sizes through a versatile and accessible payments platform. Learn more https://jazzypay.com/for-business
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! You can now configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

This is the first release of the plugin.

short_description: JazzyPay for WooCommerce - Payment plugin to easily enable faster JazzyPay checkout in your WooCommerce store.
